mapper.insert: insert into t_board set title = #{title}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt, A.created_at, B.nm FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser limit #{startIdx},#{row}
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt, A.created_at createdAt , B.nm writer, B.main_pic writerMainPic FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
